#summary Migration hints for updating from 0.4 to 0.5.

*Note that version 0.5 is still under development.*

When updating from version 0.4 to 0.5, the following aspects have changed and may have to be adjusted.

  * The {{{onActivate}}} event is no longer fired, when a page was (re)loaded
  * Define a {{{onPostInit}}} handler to implement ....
  * In lazy mode, define a {{{success}}} handler to implement ....
  * Read the documentation: there are lots of other changes and improvemnts
